fullText: Glenn Close brings her formidable dramatic authority to Edward Albee's Pulitzer Prize-winning family drama, anchoring a sterling cast in this handsome revival.
dtliExcerpt: Glenn Close brings her formidable dramatic authority to Edward Albee's Pulitzer Prize-winning family drama, anchoring a sterling cast in this handsome revival.
